title: @Rito - This tank meta is stupid broken

replies.body:
In an idea 'world' tanks would soak damage, deal small amounts and have a way to force enemies to target them. This is how it was with rammus and shen back in the day.
However, the game needed to create original ideas for tanks and keep it fresh. Tahm is an example of a fresh idea. 

These pure tanks aren't causing too much trouble to me. It's the damn akali tanks and ekko tanks.

Tahm can be kited by dodging his q.
no need to add, comments already covered it. Your build, but its also the rock papers sciccors thing also.

Flat magic pen (liandrys/sorc boots/abyssal) is good against targets with LOW mr, not tanks. Taking 50 mr off someone who has 100+ mr does way less than taking 50 mr off someone with only the base 50  or so. If you want to damage tanks, buy a void staff (this alone will give you more penetration than all 3 of the flat pen items put together later in the game vs tanks). You also complain about not being able to kite him, but for some reason you didnt buy a rylais, which is one of the best items on brand and allows you to kite immobile melees like tahm basically indefinitely.
TLDR; Your build is the main reason you felt so useless. If you had built differently, a champ like tahm would not be an issue at all (aside from maybe saving teammates from you burst)

There is nothing wrong with that, AP burst champs aren't meant to deal with tanks, you are legit useless the moment you finish your damage

It would be a different story if the fed person was a Nocturne, Yi, skilled ADC or just a consistent damage champion overall
